Browser Tab Timer – Track Your Online Time Effectively

Take control of your online habits with Browser Tab Timer, a simple yet powerful tool designed to help you track the time spent on individual browser tabs. Whether you're working, studying, or just browsing the web, this extension gives you a clear overview of how your time is distributed across different websites.

With Browser Tab Timer, you can:

    Track Time Automatically: The timer starts automatically when you switch to a new tab or open a website, ensuring accurate time tracking without manual intervention.
    Display Time in Tab Titles: Stay informed at a glance! See the total time spent on any active tab directly in its title bar.
    View and Analyze Your Activity: Access daily stats to understand your browsing patterns and identify where your time is going.
    Lightweight and Efficient: Built to run seamlessly in the background without impacting your browser’s performance.

Features:

    Automatic Time Tracking
    Automatically starts a timer for each tab you open or activate. No need to click any buttons—it's entirely hands-free!

    Real-Time Tab Title Updates
    Displays the total time spent on a website in the tab's title bar, making it easy to monitor time while browsing.

    Comprehensive Statistics
    View detailed reports of your browsing activity, broken down by domain and date, so you can analyze and optimize your online habits.

    Customizable Settings
        Enable or disable automatic time tracking with a single click.
        Toggle the tab title timer display to suit your preferences.

    Lightweight and Privacy-Focused
        Browser Tab Timer uses minimal resources to ensure a smooth browsing experience.
        Your data is stored locally on your device, ensuring your privacy.

    Works Across All Tabs
    Track time on any website, from productivity tools to social media, with support for multiple tabs and windows.

Who Can Benefit from Browser Tab Timer?

    Professionals: Monitor the time you spend on different websites while working to improve productivity.
    Students: Stay focused on educational resources by understanding your online habits.
    Self-Improvement Enthusiasts: Identify and reduce time spent on distractions to achieve your personal goals.
    Parents: Gain insights into your child’s screen time for better time management and guidance.

How It Works:

    Install the extension and enable it in your browser.
    By default, the timer starts automatically when you open or switch to a new tab.
    See the total time spent directly in the tab's title or explore detailed stats through the extension’s settings.

Privacy Policy:

Your privacy is our priority. Browser Tab Timer does not collect or share any personal data. All your activity data is stored locally on your browser, giving you full control over your information.
Get Started Today!

Take the first step toward managing your time online. Download Browser Tab Timer now and unlock your productivity potential!
